original_text: So Jonathan arose from the table in fierce anger, and did eat no meat the second day of the month: for he was grieved for David, because his father had done him shame.
korean_text: 심히 노하여 식탁에서 떠나고 그 달의 둘째 날에는 먹지 아니하였으니 이는 그의 아버지가 다윗을 욕되게 하였으므로 다윗을 위하여 슬퍼함이었더라

sentences.original_text: So Jonathan arose from the table
the second day of the month
for he was grieved for David
because his father had done him shame
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지가 그에게 부끄러움을 주었기 때문입니다
